page.title: 14Holidays on the marshes
page.content: Many tourists come to our area. On one particular summer day while we were out six coaches passed us in less than twenty minutes, they were on tours probably out from Eastbourne. There are several places where motorists may stop and enjoy the peace of the marshland. Cyclists too, because of the flatness of the area can enjoy exploring with little huffing and puffing up and down hills. People come here because it is peaceful, it is fairly easy to find quiet little corners and forget the busy main roads nearby. One word of warning unless you are a walker, you will need your own transport,the bus service is not good.
